quote: If you read a lot of books, you're considered well-read. But if you watch a lot of TV, you're not considered well-viewed. – Lily Tomlin
fact: It takes more calories to eat a piece of celery than the celery has in it to begin with.
joke: Don't trust atoms. They make up everything.
